reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: PYM MEET-Middle East Education through Technology

description.narrative: The project will support MEET-Activities on three levels: 1) implementation of MEET?s Yearlong Program, 2) building and supporting MEET?s Alumni Network, 3) execution of MEET?s intensive summer program. The goals of the project are: 1. To offer Palestinian and Israeli high school students an opportunity to break through existing misconceptions and stereotypes gain understanding and respect for one another and establish build and maintain trust. 2. To develop enduring and active professional and social netwo rks among MEET?s Palestinian and Israeli students. 3. To empower MEET?s students to become leaders in their communities and undertake initiatives that create positive social and economic change by providing each student with top-level technological busines s and leadership skills.
